description:
With offices in both Naperville and Chicago, Illinois, the Law Offices of Mathys & Schneid provides invaluable advocacy and support to individuals and families suffering from the negligent, careless or unlawful actions of others throughout the region.

Serving clients throughout DuPage County and the surrounding areas of the greater Chicago metro, the attorneys at our law firm possess more than 50 years of combined legal experience, and we have achieved notable success helping our plaintiff clients recover the maximum amount of compensation for the injuries or losses they incurred as the result of motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and other preventable tragedies.

Along with handling all types of personal injury claims, we also provide effective guidance and assistance with workers' compensation and work-related injury claims. Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for those we have served, and we have earned a reputation for delivering the personalized attention our clients deserve during their most difficult and uncertain times.

The Law Offices of Mathys & Schneid offers convenient access to the quality counsel and aggressive representation you need. To find out more about how we can help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones, you can contact us by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
